title: 你起來去那
author: papachen
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[G]你起來唱[D]歌 (讚美祂)
[G]你起來唱[C]歌 (讚美祂)
[G]你起來讚[C]美唱[A7]歌
[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]
[region 2]
lí khí-lâi tshiùnn-kua (o-ló i)
lí khí-lâi tshiùnn-kua (o-ló i)
lí khí-lâi o-ló tshiùnn-kua
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</1>
<2>

[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]
[region 2]
lí khí-lâi thiàu-bú (kám-siā i)
lí khí-lâi thiàu-bú (kám-siā i)
lí khí-lâi kám-siā thiàu-bú
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</2>
<3>
[G]你舉起雙[D]手 (高舉祂)

[G]你起來舉[C]起雙[A7]手
[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]

lí gia̍h-khí siang-tshiú (ko-kúo i)
lí gia̍h-khí siang-tshiú (ko-kúo i)
lí khí-lâi gia̍h-khí siang-tshiú
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</3>
<chorus>
我欲唱[G]歌來讚美[Am]祂
我欲跳[C]舞來感謝[D]祂

guá beh tshiùnn-kua lâi o-ló i
guá beh thiàu-bú lâi kám-siā i

title: Leaning on the Everlasting Arms
author: Elisha A. Hoffman
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[G]What a fellowship, [C2]what a joy divine! [G]Leaning on the everlasting [D]arms;
[G]What a blessedness, [C2]what a peace is mine! [G]Leaning on the ever[D]lasting [G]arms.
[region 2]
何等的深交，何等的歡喜，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂；
何等的平安，何等的福氣，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂。
</1>
<2>
[G]O how sweet to walk [C2]in this pilgrim way, [G]Leaning on the everlasting [D]arms;
[G]O how bright the path [C2]grows from day to day, [G]Leaning on the ever[D]lasting [G]arms.
[region 2]
我滿心歡喜，行走這天路，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂；
每日有榮光，照亮我旅途，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂。
</2>
<3>
[G]What have I to dread? [C2]What have I to fear? [G]Leaning on the everlasting [D]arms;
[G]I have blessed peace [C2]with my Lord so near, [G]Leaning on the ever[D]lasting [G]arms.
[region 2]
我不用畏懼，我不用驚慌，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂；
我滿有平安，主在我身旁，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂。
</3>
<chorus>
[G]Leaning, [C2]leaning, [G]Safe and secure from all a[D]larms;
[G]Leaning, [C2]leaning, [G]Leaning on the ever[D]lasting [G]arms.
[region 2]
倚靠，倚靠，平安穩妥，危險遠離；
倚靠，倚靠，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂。
</chorus>

content.origin:
[G]What a fellowship, [C2]what a joy divine! [G]Leaning on the everlasting [D]arms;
[G]What a blessedness, [C2]what a peace is mine! [G]Leaning on the ever[D]lasting [G]arms.
content.region:
何等的深交，何等的歡喜，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂；
何等的平安，何等的福氣，倚靠主耶穌永遠膀臂。

What a blessedness, what a peace is mine! Leaning on the everlasting arms.

title: 耶穌愛我我知明
author: William Batchelder Bradbury
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[D]耶穌愛我[Bm]我知明
[G]因為記載[A]佇聖經
[Bm]細漢囝仔[G/D]雖軟弱
[Em]耶穌能救[A]有替[D]贖
[region 2]
Jesus loves me this I know,
For the Bible tells me so:
Little ones to him belong,
They are weak, but he is strong.
</1>
<chorus>
[D]主耶穌[Bm]愛我，[G]主耶穌[Em]愛我[A]
[Bm]主耶穌[G]愛我，有[Em]記載[A]佇聖[D]經
[region 2]
Yes, Jesus loves me,
Yes, Jesus loves me,
Yes, Jesus loves me
The Bible tells me so!
</chorus>
<2>
[D]耶穌愛我[Bm]祂有死
[G]有將天門[A]開到離
[Bm]我的罪過[G/D]祂洗盡
[Em]予祂小子[A]入內[D]面
[region 2]
Jesus loves me He who died
Heaven's gate to open wide;
He will wash away my sin,
Let His little child come in.
</2>
<3>
[D]耶穌愛我[Bm]相同行
[G]佇我身邊[A]免驚惶
[Bm]我若愛祂[G/D]到路尾
[Em]祂必導我[A]覲天[D]父
[region 2]
Jesus loves meHe will stay
Close beside me all the way;
If I love Him, when I die
He will take me home on high.
</3>

content.origin:
[D]耶穌愛我[Bm]我知明
[G]因為記載[A]佇聖經
[Bm]細漢囝仔[G/D]雖軟弱
[Em]耶穌能救[A]有替[D]贖
content.region:
Jesus loves me this I know,
For the Bible tells me so:
Little ones to him belong,
They are weak, but he is strong.
content.origin_text:
耶穌愛我我知明
因為記載佇聖經
細漢囝仔雖軟弱
耶穌能救有替贖

祂必導我覲天父
